duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide anesthesia and related care before, during, and after surgical, diagnostic, and therapeutic procedures.
Evaluate patient history and formulate a plan of care based on patient assessment.
Administer anesthesia and monitor patient's vital signs during procedures.
Collaborate with the surgical team to ensure patient safety and comfort during procedures.
Respond to emergency situations and provide critical care as necessary.
Document patient care and maintain accurate anesthesia records.
Participate in team meetings and collaborate with other healthcare professionals for patient care planning.

education_certification.credential: Master's or Doctorate degree in Nursing with CRNA Certification
